subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: An own goal off the foot of Red Bulls defender Carlos Mendes in the 80th minute helped the host New England Revolution to a 2-1 victory last night in Major League Soccer. Mendes sent the ball back 40 yards toward Red Bulls goalkeeper Jon Conway, intending for a goal kick.The Red Bulls (10-9-3) took a 1-0 lead in the 30th minute on a goal by Jozy Altidore. Taylor Twellman tied the score in the first minute of the second half for the Revolution (12-5-6), the Eastern Conference leader.
